G

GameController - Class in controller
The GameController class is responsible for reacting to user input by calling appropriate methods from within the controller, view and model packages
The GameController class implements java.awt.MouseListener in order to receive user input from mouse actions
GameController() - Constructor for class controller.GameController
Instantiates the GameInterface and UserInterface thus starting the game
GameInterface - Class in view
The class GameInterface is responsible for displaying the primary graphics window containing the game board
GameInterface() - Constructor for class view.GameInterface
Instantiates the GameInterface
getColor() - Method in class model.Piece
 
getConnections() - Method in class model.Node
 
getCoordinate() - Method in class model.Piece
 
getCoords() - Method in class model.Node
 
getErrors() - Static method in class model.BoardError
 
getNodePosition(int) - Static method in class model.BoardLayout
 
getNodeX(int) - Static method in class model.BoardLayout
 
getNodeY(int) - Static method in class model.BoardLayout
 
getNumPieces() - Static method in class model.Board
 
getPiece(int[]) - Static method in class model.Board
 
getPieces() - Method in class model.BoardError
 
getState() - Method in class view.UserInterface
 
getTurn() - Static method in class model.Board
 
getType() - Method in class model.BoardError
 
getX() - Method in class model.Node
 
getY() - Method in class model.Node
